Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Beautiful environment, the round table settings are ideal for group dining. The food is OK, though, not especially tasty, but the menu choices are good and varied.

Review Text: The staff were super nice and friendly. It is less a cafe though and more a restaurant. They had a small selection of teas and the cakes where basically 3 type of desserts.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Very nice restaurant at the Prinsengracht. We were here for dinner. Very delicious!

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Really nice place even if you visit it with a larger group of people. We had a three courses menu and apart from the steak (too dry, therefore only four stars) everything was super tasty. Service staff is very friendly and fast. …

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Beautiful location and restaurant / Cafe. There is seating up to and almost into the canal! I sat outside and did not go indoors, but it looked quite charming. A mix between old and new Amsterdam. Gezellig indeed. …

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Great food and friendly service.  We sat outside by the canal and it’s perfect to boat and people watching.  Very fresh ingredients and tasty dishes.

Review Text:

Review Text: Service is pretty rude and arrogant. The view is very nice overlooking canals and bridges. The drunk were nice and pretty much good price quality ratio

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Nice location, service as expected, good food- nothing spectacular, For the steaks I recommend to think about sous vide and better meat quality.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: The beef stew was excellent, as well as the service and the overall vibe. Many craft beers too.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Visited Amsterdam a few time and were eating at Van Puffelen everytime. Recommed 200% for good food, nice people and a cool location.

Review Text: Well it was a rainy day in Amsterdam so we were lucky to find a cozy place inside with a wonderful view on gracht through the large windows. As we came inside, the restaurant was quite empty, but soon there were lots of people - perhaps …

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text:
Lovely place, great settings, good service and great food. Affordable prices on drinks, wine.
Can recommend it.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Great location to watch boats and the world go by. Good quality drinks. Will be coming back to try their food..

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Great service, great food, great atmosphere. Thanks for making our day even more special. Highly recommend. They have a nice private area where you can celebrate any special event.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Got the order wrong. Then when asked to correct it, they made it seem like I asked for something different.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Sensacional place. Good food, interesting decoration and very polite waiters. Food is very good and the price is fair.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: To be honest, food is plain fare, but reliably tasty. But it's atmosphere! It's the place for celebrations with three generations, and full of happy memories. A great place to go with kids and grandparents, or a group of friends or colleagues, not so much a romantic dinner for two.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: This is a great place with fantastic food.  It is like two separate places with a casual bar with cafe food on one side and finer dining on the other. Great beers and drinks. We ate on the restaurant side and had salmon, steak and venison dishes. All very good. The bread and thai pumpkin soup were also excellent.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: The atmosphere was great and the food the best of the best. The starter - carpaccio was delicious and light, the steak was on point, the dessert could have been more interesting, it was just a simple brownie with ice cream, but still very …

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Van Puffelen originally started its life as a typical Amsterdam brown cafe, but expanded over the years into two monument buildings and now incorporates a restaurant. …

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: The food and the service were impeccable. I was amazed by the quality of the food that was wonderfully well prepared (by the way the apple pie is to die for, do not miss it) !! I highly recommend this place, you will not be disappointed.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Average food and they completely missed a confirmed reservation we made for 10 persons (arguing that they had emailed us about being full but could not show us that email). Not much effort made to rectify. Finally got a table 1 hour late, food was average.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: We sat in the table and took around 15 min to have the menu. Another 15 to have the drinks. The food was tasty but the service is unbearable! Avoid this place. Staff is very arrogant!

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: My family stopped here for dinner while put exploring and we were thoroughly delighted. The food was terrific (my salmon was delicious) and the service was very attentive and accommodating. Would definitely go back.

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen

Name: Restaurant van Puffelen
Review Text: Waardeloos, bediening ongeïnteresseerd. Bier over je rug krijgen, ooh, sorry...mayonaise in je schoot geworpen,  ooh sorry. Bediening is waardeloos, eten matig tot redelijk. Nagerecht was het beste. Eens maar nooit weer. Toiletten ranzig, vloer is zeiknat. Waarvan?...
